original_text: And Abijah rested with his ancestors and was buried in the City of David. And Asa his son succeeded him as king.
korean_text: 아비얌이 그의 조상들과 함께 자니 다윗 성에 장사되고 그 아들 아사가 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And Abijah rested with his ancestors
and was buried in the City of David.
And Asa his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 아사가 왕이 되어 그를 이었습니다
